sentences.sContent: He stared at the strange apparition before him.
sentences.sCn: 他盯着面前那个古怪的幽灵。

synos.tran: 幽灵；幻影；鬼怪；离奇出现的东西

remMethod.val: ap + par (出现) + ition → 离奇出现的东西

trans.tranCn: 离奇出现的东西；  鬼怪， 幻影
trans.tranOther: An apparition is someone you see or think you see but who is not really there as a physical being
